Class RecognizeOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.model.RecognizeOptions

  • public class RecognizeOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameters to be use during a recognize call in the SpeechToText service.
